text: "Millennium 2" is a song written by Jan Nordlund, John Henrik Lagerlöf, Stefan Enberg and Daniel Bäckström, and recorded by Markoolio on his 1999 album Dikter från ett hjärta. It was also released as a single on 20 October 1999 and topped the Swedish Singles Chart. Lyrically, the song deals with the transition from 1999 to the year 2000 within the Christian calendar. The song charted at Trackslistan between 30 October-4 December 1999 and also received a Svensktoppen test on 4 December 1999, but failed to enter the chart. The song was also performed at Dansbandskampen 2009 by the Sweetshots, when Markoolio was the theme of the night. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable" ! Chart (1999-2000) !
